DSR_BCR0.description: DMA Status Register / Byte Count Register

DSR_BCR1.description: DMA Status Register / Byte Count Register

DSR_BCR2.description: DMA Status Register / Byte Count Register

DSR_BCR3.description: DMA Status Register / Byte Count Register

EINT.description: Enable Interrupt on Completion of Transfer
Enable Interrupt on Completion of Transfer
Enable Interrupt on Completion of Transfer
Enable Interrupt on Completion of Transfer

TRNG0_PKRSQ.description: RNG Poker Square Calculation Result Register

TRNG0_FRQMIN.description: RNG Frequency Count Minimum Limit Register

TRNG0_FRQMAX.description: RNG Frequency Count Maximum Limit Register

TRNG0_SCMC.description: RNG Statistical Check Monobit Count Register

TRNG0_SCML.description: RNG Statistical Check Monobit Limit Register

TRNG0_SCR1C.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 1 Count Register

TRNG0_SCR1L.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 1 Limit Register

TRNG0_SCR2C.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 2 Count Register

TRNG0_SCR2L.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 2 Limit Register

TRNG0_SCR3C.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 3 Count Register

TRNG0_SCR3L.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 3 Limit Register

TRNG0_SCR4C.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 4 Count Register

TRNG0_SCR4L.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 4 Limit Register

TRNG0_SCR5C.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 5 Count Register

TRNG0_SCR5L.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 5 Limit Register

TRNG0_SCR6PC.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 6+ Count Register

TRNG0_SCR6PL.description: RNG Statistical Check Run Length 6+ Limit Register

TRNG0_PKRCNT10.description: RNG Statistical Check Poker Count 1 and 0 Register

TRNG0_PKRCNT32.description: RNG Statistical Check Poker Count 3 and 2 Register

TRNG0_PKRCNT54.description: RNG Statistical Check Poker Count 5 and 4 Register

TRNG0_PKRCNT76.description: RNG Statistical Check Poker Count 7 and 6 Register

TRNG0_PKRCNT98.description: RNG Statistical Check Poker Count 9 and 8 Register

TRNG0_PKRCNTBA.description: RNG Statistical Check Poker Count B and A Register

TRNG0_PKRCNTDC.description: RNG Statistical Check Poker Count D and C Register

TRNG0_PKRCNTFE.description: RNG Statistical Check Poker Count F and E Register

UNUSED.description: This bit is unused but write-able. Must be left as zero.

FCT_VAL.description: Read only: Frequency Count Valid. Indicates that a valid frequency count may be read from FRQCNT.

TST_OUT.description: Read only: Test point inside ring oscillator.

TF1BR0.description: Test Fail, 1-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF1BR0=1, the 1-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF1BR1.description: Test Fail, 1-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF1BR1=1, the 1-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF2BR0.description: Test Fail, 2-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF2BR0=1, the 2-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF2BR1.description: Test Fail, 2-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF2BR1=1, the 2-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF3BR0.description: Test Fail, 3-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF3BR0=1, the 3-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF3BR1.description: Test Fail, 3-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF3BR1=1, the 3-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF4BR0.description: Test Fail, 4-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF4BR0=1, the 4-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF4BR1.description: Test Fail, 4-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF4BR1=1, the 4-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF5BR0.description: Test Fail, 5-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF5BR0=1, the 5-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF5BR1.description: Test Fail, 5-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF5BR1=1, the 5-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF6PBR0.description: Test Fail, 6 Plus Bit Run, Sampling 0s

TF6PBR1.description: Test Fail, 6 Plus Bit Run, Sampling 1s

TFSB.description: Test Fail, Sparse Bit. If TFSB=1, the Sparse Bit Test has failed.

TFLR.description: Test Fail, Long Run. If TFLR=1, the Long Run Test has failed.

TFP.description: Test Fail, Poker. If TFP=1, the Poker Test has failed.

TFMB.description: Test Fail, Mono Bit. If TFMB=1, the Mono Bit Test has failed.

SH0.description: Reserved. DRNG specific, not applicable to this version.

NO_PRGM.description: If set the TRNG registers cannot be programmed

SK_VAL.description: Reserved. DRNG-specific, not applicable to this version.

HW_ERR.description: Bit position that can be cleared if corresponding bit of INT_STATUS has been asserted.
Bit position that can be cleared if corresponding bit of INT_STATUS has been asserted.

RNG_MIN_REV.description: Shows the Freescale IP's Minor revision of the TRNG.

RNG_MAJ_REV.description: Shows the Freescale IP's Major revision of the TRNG.

RNG_CONFIG_OPT.description: Shows the Freescale IP's Configuaration options for the TRNG.

RNG_ECO_REV.description: Shows the Freescale IP's ECO revision of the TRNG.

RNG_INTG_OPT.description: Shows the Freescale integration options for the TRNG.

RNG_ERA.description: Shows the Freescale compile options for the TRNG.

CTAR%s.description: Clock and Transfer Attributes Register (In Master Mode)

CTAR_SLAVE.description: Clock and Transfer Attributes Register (In Slave Mode)

RSER.description: DMA/Interrupt Request Select and Enable Register

PUSHR.description: PUSH TX FIFO Register In Master Mode

PUSHR_SLAVE.description: PUSH TX FIFO Register In Slave Mode

PCSIS.description: Peripheral Chip Select x Inactive State

RFDF_DIRS.description: Receive FIFO Drain DMA or Interrupt Request Select

TFFF_DIRS.description: Transmit FIFO Fill DMA or Interrupt Request Select

PCS.description: Select which PCS signals are to be asserted for the transfer

CLPD.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLPS.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP4.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP3.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP2.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP1.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP0.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLMD.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLMS.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM4.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM3.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM2.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM1.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM0.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

DACBFRPBF.description: DAC Buffer Read Pointer Bottom Position Flag

DACBFRPTF.description: DAC Buffer Read Pointer Top Position Flag

DACBBIEN.description: DAC Buffer Read Pointer Bottom Flag Interrupt Enable

DACBTIEN.description: DAC Buffer Read Pointer Top Flag Interrupt Enable

GENCS.description: TSI General Control and Status Register

MODE.description: TSI analog modes setup and status bits.

SIM_MISCTL.description: This bit control the function of RF_ACTIVE on PTC1/PTC19 ALT7

TPM1CH0SRC.description: TPM1 Channel 0 Input Capture Source Select

TPM2CH0SRC.description: TPM2 Channel 0 Input Capture Source Select

MAXADDR1.description: This field concatenated with leading zeros plus the value of the MAXADDR1 field indicates the first invalid address of the second program flash block (flash block 1)

RXEDGIE.description: RX Input Active Edge Interrupt Enable

RXEDGIF.description: LPUART_RX Pin Active Edge Interrupt Flag

TXDIR.description: LPUART_TX Pin Direction in Single-Wire Mode

R0T0.description: Read receive data buffer 0 or write transmit data buffer 0.

R1T1.description: Read receive data buffer 1 or write transmit data buffer 1.

R2T2.description: Read receive data buffer 2 or write transmit data buffer 2.

R3T3.description: Read receive data buffer 3 or write transmit data buffer 3.

R4T4.description: Read receive data buffer 4 or write transmit data buffer 4.

R5T5.description: Read receive data buffer 5 or write transmit data buffer 5.

R6T6.description: Read receive data buffer 6 or write transmit data buffer 6.

R7T7.description: Read receive data buffer 7 or write transmit data buffer 7.

R8T8.description: Read receive data buffer 8 or write transmit data buffer 8.

R9T9.description: Read receive data buffer 9 or write transmit data buffer 9.

PARITYE.description: The current received dataword contained in DATA[R9:R0] was received with a parity error.

NOISY.description: The current received dataword contained in DATA[R9:R0] was received with noise.

ENC.description: Encrypt/Decrypt. This bit selects encryption or decryption.

ICV_TEST.description: ICV Checking / Test AES fault detection

ALG.description: Algorithm. This field specifies which algorithm is being selected.

KS.description: Key Size. This is the size of a Key measured in bytes

AES.description: Reset AESA. Writing a 1 to this bit resets the AES Accelerator core engine.

IM.description: Interrupt Mask. Once this bit is set, it can only be cleared by hard reset.

IFS.description: Input FIFO Byte Swap. Byte swap all data that is written to the Input FIFO.

OFS.description: Output FIFO Byte Swap. Byte swap all data that is read from the Onput FIFO.

CM.description: Clear the Mode Register. Writing a one to this bit causes the Mode Register to be cleared.

CICV.description: Clear the ICV Size Register. Writing a one to this bit causes the ICV Size Register to be cleared.

CCR.description: Clear the Context Register. Writing a one to this bit causes the Context Register to be cleared.

COF.description: Clear Output FIFO. Writing a 1 to this bit causes the Output FIFO to be cleared.

CIF.description: Clear Input FIFO. Writing a 1 to this bit causes the Input Data FIFO.

CL1.description: algorithms. The algorithms field indicates which algorithm is asserting an error. Others reserved

AL.description: AAD Last. Only AAD data will be written into the Input FIFO.

IFL.description: Input FIFO Level. These bits indicate the current number of entries in the Input FIFO.

IFF.description: Input FIFO Full. The Input FIFO is full and should not be written to.

OFL.description: Output FIFO Level. These bits indicate the current number of entries in the Output FIFO.

OFF.description: Output FIFO Full. The Output FIFO is full and should not be written to.

BLE_RF_OSC_REQ_INT_EN.description: BLE Ref Osc (Sysclk) Request Interrupt Enable

BLE_RF_OSC_REQ_INT.description: BLE Ref Osc (Sysclk) Request Interrupt Flag

RF_OSC_READY_OVRD_EN.description: RF Ref Osc Ready Override Enable

BLE_ACTIVE_FINE_DELAY.description: The SoC Flash is presented with a BLE Active early warning signal to allow the Flash to complete any program or erase activities prior to a Radio communication event

BLE_ACTIVE_COARSE_DELAY.description: The SoC Flash is presented with a BLE Active early warning signal to allow the Flash to complete any program or erase activities prior to a Radio communication event

DCDC_DISABLE_AUTO_CLK_SWITCH.description: Disable automatic clock switch from internal oscillator to external clock.

DCDC_SEL_CLK.description: Select external clock for DCDC when DCDC_DISABLE_AUTO_CLK_SWITCH is set.

DCDC_PWD_OSC_INT.description: Power down internal oscillator. Only set this bit when 32M crystal oscillator is available.

DCDC_LP_DF_CMP_ENABLE.description: Enable low power differential comparators, to sense lower supply in pulsed mode

DCDC_LP_STATE_HYS_L.description: Configure the hysteretic lower threshold value in low power mode

DCDC_LP_STATE_HYS_H.description: Configure the hysteretic upper threshold value in low power mode

HYST_LP_COMP_ADJ.description: Adjust hysteretic value in low power comparator.

HYST_LP_CMP_DISABLE.description: Disable hysteresis in low power comparator.

OFFSET_RSNS_LP_ADJ.description: Adjust hysteretic value in low power voltage sense.

OFFSET_RSNS_LP_DISABLE.description: Disable hysteresis in low power voltage sense.

DCDC_LESS_I.description: Reduce DCDC current. It will save approximately 20 uA in RUN.

PSWITCH_STATUS.description: Status register to indicate PSWITCH status

VLPS_CONFIG_DCDC_HP.description: Selects behavior of DCDC in device VLPS low power mode

VLPR_VLPW_CONFIG_DCDC_HP.description: Selects behavior of DCDC in device VLPR and VLPW low power modes

DCDC_STS_DC_OK.description: Status register to indicate DCDC lock

POSLIMIT_BUCK_IN.description: Upper limit duty cycle limit in DC-DC converter

POSLIMIT_BOOST_IN.description: Upper limit duty cycle limit in DC-DC converter

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_CM_HST_THRESH.description: Enable hysteresis in switching converter common mode analog comparators

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_DF_HST_THRESH.description: Enable hysteresis in switching converter differential mode analog comparators

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_EN_CM_HYST.description: Enable hysteresis in switching converter common mode analog comparators

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_EN_DF_HYST.description: Enable hysteresis in switching converter differential mode analog comparators

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_DC_C.description: Ratio of integral control parameter to proportional control parameter in the switching DC-DC converter, it can be used to optimize efficiency and loop response

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_DC_FF.description: Two complement feed forward step in duty cycle in the switching DC-DC converter

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_HYST_SIGN.description: Invert the sign of the hysteresis in DC-DC analog comparators. This bit is set when in Pulsed mode.

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_TOGGLE_DIF.description: Set high to enable supply stepping to change, only after the differential control loop has toggled

DCDC_BATTMONITOR_EN_BATADJ.description: This bit enables the DC-DC to improve efficiency and minimize ripple using the information from the BATT_VAL field

DCDC_BATTMONITOR_BATT_VAL.description: Software should be configured to place the battery voltage in this register measured with an 8 mV LSB resolution through the ADC

DCDC_VDD1P8CTRL_TRG.description: Target value of VDD1P8, 25 mV each step in two ranges, from 0x00 to 0x11 and 0x20 to 0x3F.

DCDC_VDD1P45CTRL_TRG_BUCK.description: Target value of VDD1P45 in buck mode, 25 mV each step from 0x00 to 0x0F

DCDC_VDD1P45CTRL_TRG_BOOST.description: Target value of VDD1P45 in boost mode, 25 mV each step from 0x00 to 0x0F

DCDC_VDD1P45CTRL_ADJTN.description: Adjust value of duty cycle when switching between VDD1P45 and VDD1P8. The unit is 1/32 or 3.125%.

DCDC_MINPWR_DC_HALFCLK_PULSED.description: Set DCDC clock to half frequency for the Pulsed mode.

DCDC_MINPWR_DOUBLE_FETS_PULSED.description: Use double switch FET for the Pulsed mode.

DCDC_MINPWR_HALF_FETS_PULSED.description: Use half switch FET for the Pulsed mode.

DCDC_MINPWR_DC_HALFCLK.description: Set DCDC clock to half frequency for the continuous mode.

DCDC_MINPWR_DOUBLE_FETS.description: Use double switch FET for the continuous mode.

DCDC_MINPWR_HALF_FETS.description: Use half switch FET for the continuous mode.

DCDC_VDD1P45CTRL_DISABLE_STEP.description: Disable stepping for VDD1P45. Must set this bit before enter low power modes.

DCDC_VDD1P8CTRL_DISABLE_STEP.description: Disable stepping for VDD1P8. Must set this bit before enter low power modes.

DCDC_SW_SHUTDOWN.description: Shut down DCDC in buck mode. DCDC can be turned on by pulling PSWITCH to high momentarily (min 50 ms).

UNLOCK.description: 0x3E77 KEY-Key needed to unlock HW_POWER_RESET register

PSWITCH_INT_RISE_EN.description: Enable rising edge detect for interrupt.

PSWITCH_INT_FALL_EN.description: Enable falling edge detect for interrupt.

PSWITCH_INT_CLEAR.description: Write 1 to clear interrupt. Set to 0 after clear.

PSWITCH_INT_MUTE.description: Mask interrupt to SoC, edge detection result can be read from PSIWTCH_INT_STS.

INTEGRATOR_VALUE.description: Integrator value which can be loaded in pulsed mode

INTEGRATOR_VALUE_SEL.description: Select the integrator value from above register or saved value in hardware.

LATCH_AFC_ON_ACCESS_MATCH.description: Latch AFC Estimation on Access Address Match

PLL_LD_HPM_CAL1.description: PLL Cycle Slip Lock Detect Configuration and HPM Calibration 1

PLL_LD_HPM_CAL2.description: PLL Cycle Slip Lock Detect Configuration and HPM Calibration 2

PLL_LP_SDM_NUM.description: PLL Low Port SDM Numerator Applied

PLL_LP_SDM_DENOM.description: PLL Low Port SDM Denominator Applied

BBF_DCOC_STEP_RECIP.description: DCOC BBF Reciprocal of Step Size

TCA_AGC_LIN_VAL_0.description: LNM linear gain value for index 0, e.g. nominal value is 10^(-3/20). Stored with 2 fractional bits, e.g. round([10^(-3/20)]*2^2) = 3decimal

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_0.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 0

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_1.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 1

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_2.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 2

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_3.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 3

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_4.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 4

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_5.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 5

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_6.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 6

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_7.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 7

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_8.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 8

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_9.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 9

BBF_RES_TUNE_LIN_VAL_10.description: BBF Resistor Tune Linear Gain Step 10

GFSK_MULTIPLY_TABLE_MANUAL.description: GFSK Multiply Lookup Table Override Value

FSK_MODULATION_SCALE_0.description: FSK Modulation Scale for a data 0

FSK_MODULATION_SCALE_1.description: FSK Modulation Scale for a data 1

CHANNEL_NUM.description: Protocol specific Channel Number for PLL Frequency Mapping

CT_FAIL.description: Real time status of Coarse Tune Fail signal

CTFF.description: CTUNE Failure Flag, held until cleared

CS_FAIL.description: Real time status of Cycle Slip circuit

CSFF.description: Cycle Slip Failure Flag, held until cleared

FT_FAIL.description: Real time status of Frequency Target Failure

FTW_RX.description: RX Frequency Target Window time select

FTW_TX.description: TX Frequency Target Window time select

HP_CAL_DIS.description: If this bit is set, the lookup table value for the HPM Calibration Factor is overridden by the HPM_CAL_FACTOR_MANUAL register

HP_CAL_ARY.description: High Port Modulation Calibration Array Size

LPM_D_CTRL.description: LPM Dither Control in Override Mode

LPM_INTG_SELECTED.description: Low Port Modulation Integer Value Selected

LPM_INTG.description: Low Port Modulation Integer Manual Value

RAW_MODE_I.description: DTEST Raw Mode Enable for I Channel

RAW_MODE_Q.description: DTEST Raw Mode Enable for Q Channel

ABORT_ON_CTUNE.description: Abort On Coarse Tune Lock Detect Failure

ABORT_ON_CYCLE_SLIP.description: Abort On Cycle Slip Lock Detect Failure

ABORT_ON_FREQ_TARG.description: Abort On Frequency Target Lock Detect Failure

IQMC_DC_GAIN_ADJ.description: IQ Mismatch Correction DC Gain Coeff

HPM_LSB_INVERT.description: High port LSB array inversion control

SEQIRQ.description: Sequence-end Interrupt Status bit. A '1' indicates the completion of an autosequence. This interrupt will assert whenever the Sequence Manager transitions from non-idle to idle state, for any reason. This is write a '1' to clear bit.

TXIRQ.description: Transmitter Interrupt Status bit. A '1' indicates the completion of a transmit operation. This is write a '1' to clear bit.

RXIRQ.description: Receiver Interrupt Status bit. A '1' indicates the completion of a receive operation. This is write a '1' to clear bit.

CCAIRQ.description: Clear Channel Assessment Interrupt Status bit. A '1' indicates completion of CCA operation. This is write '1' to clear bit.

RXWTRMRKIRQ.description: Receiver Byte Count Water Mark Interrupt Status bit. A '1' indicates that the number of bytes specified in the RX_WTR_MARK register has been reached. This is write a '1' to clear bit.

FILTERFAIL_IRQ.description: Receiver Packet Filter Fail Interrupt Status bit. A '1' indicates that the most-recently received packet has been rejected due to elements within the packet. This is write a '1' to clear bit. In Dual PAN mode, FILTERFAIL_IRQ applies to either or both networks, as follows: A: If PAN0 and PAN1 occupy different channels and CURRENT_NETWORK=0, FILTERFAIL_IRQ applies to PAN0. B: If PAN0 and PAN1 occupy different channels and CURRENT_NETWORK=1, FILTERFAIL_IRQ applies to PAN1. C: If PAN0 and PAN1 occupy the same channel, FILTERFAIL_IRQ is the logical 'AND' of the individual PANs' Filter Fail status.

PLL_UNLOCK_IRQ.description: PLL Un-lock Interrupt Status bit. A '1' indicates an unlock event has occurred in the PLL. This is write a '1' to clear bit.

RX_FRM_PEND.description: Status of the frame pending bit of the frame control field for the most-recently received packet. Read-only.

PANCORDNTR0.description: Device is a PAN Coordinator on PAN0

MACLONGADDRS0_LSB.description: MAC LONG ADDRESS for PAN0 LSB

MACLONGADDRS0_MSB.description: MAC LONG ADDRESS for PAN0 MSB

CCA2_NUM_CORR_PEAKS.description: CCA Mode 2 Number of Correlation Peaks Detected

CCA2_MIN_NUM_CORR_TH.description: CCA Mode 2 Threshold Number of Correlation Peaks

MACLONGADDRS1_LSB.description: MAC LONG ADDRESS for PAN1 LSB

MACLONGADDRS1_MSB.description: MAC LONG ADDRESS for PAN1 MSB

DUAL_PAN_AUTO.description: Activates automatic Dual PAN operating mode

PANCORDNTR1.description: Device is a PAN Coordinator on PAN1

CURRENT_NETWORK.description: Indicates which PAN is currently selected by hardware

DUAL_PAN_DWELL.description: Dual PAN Channel Frequency Dwell Time

DUAL_PAN_REMAIN.description: Time Remaining before next PAN switch in auto Dual PAN mode

RECD_ON_PAN0.description: Last Packet was Received on PAN0

RECD_ON_PAN1.description: Last Packet was Received on PAN1

SAP0_EN.description: Enables SAP0 Partition of the SAM Table

SAA0_EN.description: Enables SAA0 Partition of the SAM Table

SAP1_EN.description: Enables SAP1 Partition of the SAM Table

SAA1_EN.description: Enables SAA1 Partition of the SAM Table

SAM_INDEX.description: Contains the SAM table index to be enabled or invalidated

SAM_INDEX_WR.description: Enables SAM Table Contents to be updated

SAM_CHECKSUM.description: Software-computed source address checksum, to be installed into a table index

SAM_INDEX_INV.description: Invalidate the SAM table index selected by SAM_INDEX

SAM_INDEX_EN.description: Enable the SAM table index selected by SAM_INDEX

ACK_FRM_PND.description: Software-override value for the state of the AutoTxAck FramePending field

ACK_FRM_PND_CTRL.description: Software-override control for the state of the AutoTxAck FramePending field

SAP0_MATCH.description: Index in the SAP0 Partition of the SAM Table corresponding to the first checksum match

SAP0_ADDR_PRESENT.description: A Checksum Match is Present in the SAP0 Partition of the SAM Table

SAA0_MATCH.description: Index in the SAA0 Partition of the SAM Table corresponding to the first checksum match

SAA0_ADDR_ABSENT.description: A Checksum Match is Absent in the SAA0 Partition of the SAM Table

SAP1_MATCH.description: Index in the SAP1 Partition of the SAM Table corresponding to the first checksum match

SAP1_ADDR_PRESENT.description: A Checksum Match is Present in the SAP1 Partition of the SAM Table

SAA1_MATCH.description: Index in the SAA1 Partition of the SAM Table corresponding to the first checksum match

SAA1_ADDR_ABSENT.description: A Checksum Match is Absent in the SAP1 Partition of the SAM Table

SAP0_1ST_FREE_IDX.description: First non-enabled (invalid) index in the SAP0 partition

SAA0_1ST_FREE_IDX.description: First non-enabled (invalid) index in the SAA0 partition

SAP1_1ST_FREE_IDX.description: First non-enabled (invalid) index in the SAP1 partition

SAA1_1ST_FREE_IDX.description: First non-enabled (invalid) index in the SAA1 partition

CLR_NEW_SEQ_INHIBIT.description: Overrides the automatic hardware locking of the programmed XCVSEQ while an autosequence is underway

EVENT_TMR_DO_NOT_LATCH.description: Overrides the automatic hardware latching of the Event Timer

FORCE_CRC_ERROR.description: Induce a CRC Error in Transmitted Packets

CONTINUOUS_EN.description: Enable Continuous TX or RX Mode

XCVSEQ_ACTUAL.description: Reflects the programmed sequence that has been recognized by the ZSM Sequence Manager

RX_TIMEOUT_PENDING.description: Indicates a TMR3 RX Timeout is Pending

TMR2_SEQ_TRIG_ARMED.description: indicates that TMR2 has been programmed and is armed to trigger a new autosequence

SEQ_T_STATUS.description: Status of the just-completed or ongoing Sequence T or Sequence TR

SW_ABORTED.description: Autosequence has terminated due to a Software abort.

TC3_ABORTED.description: Autosequence has terminated due to an TMR3 timeout

PLL_ABORTED.description: Autosequence has terminated due to an PLL unlock event

ACKDELAY.description: Provides a fine-tune adjustment of the time delay between Rx warmdown and the beginning of Tx warmup for an autoTxAck packet

TXDELAY.description: Provides a fine-tune adjustment of the time delay between post-CCA Rx warm-down and the beginning of Tx warm-up

FILTERFAIL_PAN_SEL.description: PAN Selector for Filter Fail Code

RX_WTR_MARK.description: Receive byte count needed to trigger a RXWTRMRKIRQ interrupt

PLL_ABORTED.description: Autosequence has terminated due to an PLL unlock event

CCCA_BUSY_CNT.description: Number of CCA Measurements resulting in Busy Channel

CGH1.description: CMT Carrier Generator High Data Register 1

CGL1.description: CMT Carrier Generator Low Data Register 1

CGH2.description: CMT Carrier Generator High Data Register 2

CGL2.description: CMT Carrier Generator Low Data Register 2

MSC.description: CMT Modulator Status and Control Register

CMD1.description: CMT Modulator Data Register Mark High

CMD2.description: CMT Modulator Data Register Mark Low

CMD3.description: CMT Modulator Data Register Space High

CMD4.description: CMT Modulator Data Register Space Low

PH.description: Primary Carrier High Time Data Value

PL.description: Primary Carrier Low Time Data Value

SH.description: Secondary Carrier High Time Data Value

SL.description: Secondary Carrier Low Time Data Value

ATCVH.description: MCG Auto Trim Compare Value High Register

ATCVL.description: MCG Auto Trim Compare Value Low Register

FCFTRIM.description: Fast Internal Reference Clock Fine Trim

SCTRIM.description: Slow Internal Reference Clock Trim Setting

SCFTRIM.description: Slow Internal Reference Clock Fine Trim

FCTRIM.description: Fast Internal Reference Clock Trim Setting

DMX32.description: DCO Maximum Frequency with 32.768 kHz Reference

FLT.description: I2C Programmable Input Glitch Filter Register

SMB.description: I2C SMBus Control and Status register

SLTH.description: I2C SCL Low Timeout Register High

SLTL.description: I2C SCL Low Timeout Register Low

SSIE.description: I2C Bus Stop or Start Interrupt Enable

LVDSC1.description: Low Voltage Detect Status And Control 1 register

LVDSC2.description: Low Voltage Detect Status And Control 2 register

RSTFLTSRW.description: Reset Pin Filter Select in Run and Wait Modes

RSTFLTSS.description: Reset Pin Filter Select in Stop Mode

RSTFLTSEL.description: Reset Pin Filter Bus Clock Select

ASC.description: Each bit in the ASC field indicates whether there is a corresponding connection to the crossbar switch's slave input port.

AMC.description: Each bit in the AMC field indicates whether there is a corresponding connection to the AXBS master input port.
